title: Ticket #6773: JobStartDate is missing for grid universe jobs
description: In the OSG, the Gratia accounting probe uses JobStartDate as part of its Walltime calcuations. However, JobStartDate does not seem to get populated for grid universe jobs so our accounting records from Hosted (i.e., bosco) CEs are not formatted properly. We don't notice this issue with 'batch' grid universe jobs submitted against other batch systems since we query those batch systems directly. We'd like grid universe jobs to populate JobStartDate with the time that it notices that the downstream job is running.
remarks:
2018-Oct-16 13:00:49 by jfrey:
The following job attributes are now set correctly for grid universe jobs and propagated by the job router:
  • JobStartDate
  • JobCurrentStartDate
  • JobLastStartDate
  • JobCurrentStartExecutingDate

2018-Oct-17 16:25:21 by tlmiller:
Code Review

Looks good. It's a little saddening that ATTR_JOB_START_DATE really should ATTR_JOB_FIRST_START_DATE, but that's Condor for you.
check_ins:
